infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RacePilot needs your location to track your sailing sessions and provide real-time navigation data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RacePilot needs background location access to continue tracking your sailing sessions when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RacePilot needs background location access to continue tracking your sailing sessions.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: RacePilot needs Bluetooth access to connect to your wind sensor and other marine instruments.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: RacePilot needs Bluetooth access to connect to your wind sensor.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow RacePilot to use your location to track sailing sessions.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow RacePilot to use your location in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow RacePilot to use your location while using the app.
